p: It is known that use of curcumin, resveratrol, withaferin A (a steroidal lactone), celastrol (a pentacyclic triterpenoid) isolated from the root of the “thunder god vine” ( Tripterygium wilfordii), ursolic acid, and zerumbone, isolated from rhizomes of Zingiber zerumbet, can counteract the mechanisms of tumor resistance to radiotherapy with different action mechanisms such as increasing ROS production, inhibition of HIF-1 protein levels and inducing a reduction of the intratumoral necrotic areas [ 14].
